actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Labor to change the name of the Wholesale Price Index to the Basic Price Index.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Labor to change the name of the Wholesale Price Index to the Basic Price Index. Sets limitations upon the use of the term "wholesale" in data published by the Department of Labor.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Labor to change the name of the Wholesale Price Index to the Basic Price Index.
